hero.title: Hi, I'm Esteban Sayago
hero.about: Full Stack Developer. Effective communication, critical thinking and decision making.

experiencia.title: Back End Developer
experiencia.description: MVP development of a shipping management company. Participate in Back End development, creating a REST API, user authentication, shipment management and tracking. On the Front End improve software delivery times and lead the integration with the Back End.

experiencia.title: Full Stack Developer
experiencia.description: From simple web development using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. To Full Stack application development with React, Express and NoSQL databases. During all this time I have learned to apply best coding practices, develop strong problem solving skills and search for solutions.

proyectos.title: Movies App
proyectos.subtitle: January 2023
proyectos.description: Doing this project helped me to improve my skills with customs hooks, separation of responsibilities, page routing from the client, and how to optimize data fetching with technologies like SWR.

proyectos.title: Weather App
proyectos.subtitle: September 2023
proyectos.description: In this project I applied my knowledge of code best practices, such as separating logic/component in customs hooks, keeping a clean and readable code, separating the responsibilities of each component and keeping order in the project structure.

proyectos.title: Grocery Food
proyectos.subtitle: October 2023
proyectos.description: Food Delivery Landing Page, with this page I wanted to test myself by taking a project created in Figma, translate it to code and add responsive views using only HTML and CSS.

proyectos.title: Markdown Previewer
proyectos.subtitle: December 2023
proyectos.description: Project for freeCodeCamp Front End Libraries certification. Using React and the marked library to render Markdown.

proyectos.title: Encryptor
proyectos.subtitle: April 2023
proyectos.description: One of the challenges of Oracle's ONE program, a simple encryptor using JavaScript to improve our programming logic.

proyectos.title: Memory game
proyectos.subtitle: July 2023
proyectos.description: A memory game or matchmaking game using React, in this project I have used advanced programming topics such as recursive functions for the generation of the boards.
